title: The President
description: Responding to the real-life political climate of a country in the midst of change, author Parker Hudson explores the dilemma of a fictional leader who enters the presidency as a non-believer, but who soon finds his political positions challenged as a result of his new-found Christian faith. Filled with the essentials of successful political novels-terrorism, blackmail, warheads, and competing political agendas-The President delivers a powerful message about the impact of believers in the world today.
author: Parker Hudson
